about.title: Crusty IT
about.p1: Hi! My name is Tomasz Skorupski. For years I ensured systems ran reliably ‚Äî administering servers (Windows/Linux), networks and databases. I realized I don‚Äôt want to just fix, maintain and change, but above all create. Today I use that solid technical foundation to build and improve solutions.
about.approachIntro: I‚Äôm not just a developer, nor just an administrator. I am a versatile specialist who sees the bigger picture. My hybrid expertise ensures that the solutions I design are not only innovative but also infrastructurally robust.

points.design: Design & Improve: I write code and build applications while taking care of their architecture, testing, and optimization to eliminate defects.
points.deploy: Deploy: I use Git and Docker and develop core CI/CD skills so that my workflows are repeatable and safe.
points.support: Support & Understand: Thanks to experience in IT Support and Administration, I understand the user perspective and operational challenges. I know how crucial stability and security are in day-to-day work.

about.growth: In parallel, I‚Äôm developing my competencies by delivering my own projects. While professionally I focus on your needs, privately I‚Äôm passionate about the development and practical use of AI agents in automation ‚Äî which always translates into a better understanding of modern architectures.
about.goal: I‚Äôm not looking for "just another gig". I‚Äôm actively seeking a Partner or Employer with whom I can build a relationship for years. I care about a place where I can bring real value from day one and continuously grow my competencies through ambitious, joint projects.

facts.locationValue: Stargard, Poland ‚Ä¢ open to remote work/hybrid

streetcom.where: Streetcom ‚Ä¢ IT Systems Administrator & Junior Developer
bullets: Comprehensive management of the IT environment, including administration of systems, servers and databases, as well as their development and modernization ‚Äî with a focus on stability, security and the real needs of everyday users.

Resolving employees‚Äô technical and functional issues based on collaboration, analysis and understanding how technology affects their daily work ‚Äî from minor hiccups to complex incidents requiring deeper diagnostics.

Creating and developing content and functionality in internal systems, including documentation, modules and enhancements that improved communication, streamlined processes and increased efficiency across the company.

Participating in automation and process‚Äëoptimization initiatives by designing tools and solutions that eliminated repetitive tasks, improved system reliability and noticeably enhanced user experience.

Deployment and integration of secure/pull printing systems for clients across diverse industries ‚Äî from production floors to accounting offices and notary chambers ‚Äî tailored to their workflows, processes and real business needs.
Resolving technical issues remotely and on‚Äësite through direct communication, process analysis and rapid adaptation of solutions that restored the continuity of entire teams‚Äô work.
Optimization and stabilization of printing environments, including streamlining device communication, improving throughput and reducing latency affecting key operational processes.
Ongoing supervision of devices and printing environments, proactive monitoring and rapid response to anomalies so that technology remained a safe, predictable work tool for clients.

Administration of systems and network infrastructure, including rolling out new technologies, modernizing the environment, and ensuring the stability and security of tools used across the organization at every level.

Building a new server room from the ground up: physical assembly, configuration and commissioning of network and server hardware ‚Äî a project requiring precision, planning and responsibility for the foundations of the company‚Äôs entire infrastructure.
Ensuring uninterrupted operation of key applications and services ‚Äî from operational tools to end‚Äëuser systems ‚Äî with quick incident response and a strong focus on minimizing downtime.
Close cooperation with users and teams, focused on rapidly resolving tickets, explaining how systems work and fostering an environment where technology genuinely improved daily work.
Configuration and supervision of IT systems and administration of network infrastructure supporting the institution‚Äôs stable operations and secure flow of data in day‚Äëto‚Äëday team work.
Ongoing user support in daily tasks, swift response to tickets and resolution of technical issues ‚Äî helping turn technology into a tool rather than an obstacle for employees.
Ensuring continuous availability of systems and services, monitoring their performance and promptly eliminating irregularities to minimize downtime and keep core operational processes efficient.
Collaboration with various departments to better understand their needs and adapt IT solutions to how they actually work.
IT support for retail: service tickets, diagnostics and repair of POS equipment.
Network and device configuration, IT assets inventory.
Fiscal devices service - solving diverse issues across many locations.
Service and configuration of printing devices, user hardware support in bank branches.
On‚Äësite diagnostics and work continuity restoration.
Preparing, configuring and deploying new equipment in the field.
Remote IT support for hospitals and emergency medical teams.
Handling tickets: diagnostics, incident resolution, escalation.
Configurations and changes: workstations, medical apps, permissions.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitleHtml: My public portfolio is modest for now, as most of my past work was done for employers and cannot be shared openly. In parallel, I‚Äôm building a series of demo projects - new items will appear here soon. I publish everything, including smaller and experimental works, on <link>GitHub</link>.

smartQuoteAI.title: SmartQuote AI - intelligent offer & contract builder (available in beta version)
smartQuoteAI.subtitle: CRM with AI assistant for sales management
smartQuoteAI.description: A web app for managing offers, contracts, and customer relationships. An embedded AI assistant (Google Gemini) helps draft offers, analyze clients, and generate professional emails. The system includes an offer builder with VAT calculation, PDF generation, follow-ups with notifications, and a dashboard with statistics. Currently in testing and refinement phase.

postlio.title: Intelligent Social Media Assistant (work has started)
postlio.subtitle: Create, schedule and publish posts to FB, IG and LinkedIn with AI
postlio.description:
Postlio is a modern Progressive Web App (PWA) that helps small businesses and creators professionally manage their social media presence. The app enables creating, scheduling and automatic publishing of content to Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn. At its core is an intelligent AI Agent that generates engaging posts tailored to each platform, creates visuals and suggests optimal publishing schedules. The interface is designed mobile‚Äëfirst, providing full functionality on both mobile and desktop.

Project in early development phase

mobiSalon.title: Mobi Salon - one‚Äëpage website with CMS
mobiSalon.subtitle: Marketing site for a grooming salon with News and availability admin panel
mobiSalon.description: A lightweight single‚Äëpage website serving as the salon‚Äôs online presence and communications hub. I integrated an admin panel (Decap CMS) that lets the owner publish News posts and mark availability dates without developer support. The layout is fully responsive.

ksefMaster.title: KSeF Master - accounting tool (in development)
ksefMaster.subtitle: KSeF integration: fetch and create invoices
ksefMaster.description: KSeF Master is a professional browser-based application that comprehensively supports the management of the National E-Invoicing System (KSeF). It enables the efficient creation and submission of invoices to KSeF, as well as their retrieval. The system effectively manages the client database and additionally generates invoices in a PDF format compliant with the official scheme. The backend, developed by me, was specifically built to handle and process the complex KSeF API, ensuring stable and reliable communication with the system.

pwaCookbook.title: Mobile Cookbook (PWA)
pwaCookbook.subtitle: Progressive Web App - diploma project
pwaCookbook.description: I built a progressive web app (PWA) that helps plan meals based on ingredients available at home. It integrates a recipe database, preparation steps and side‚Äëdish cooking times, while a built‚Äëin timer with sound notification helps control the process. Designed mobile‚Äëfirst, it also works offline and is accessible on any device with a browser. It truly shortens time spent cooking and helps decide ‚Äúwhat to cook.‚Äù Built with React, focusing on performance and UX, as part of my diploma work.

animalsOnePage.title: Interesting Animals - One Page
animalsOnePage.subtitle: Simple One Page website (student project)
animalsOnePage.description: A very simple, static one‚Äëpage website created during studies as part of an assignment. It presents selected, interesting animal species in short sections - with basic info and curiosities. I treat it as a small supplementary piece showing consistency in documenting progress. I‚Äôm aware it doesn‚Äôt represent my current skills and I‚Äôll replace it with newer, original projects soon.
